meanings.definition: A television program that raises money for charity.
meanings.sent1: Many people donate to telethons to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: Last night, I watched a telethon to support a local charity.
meanings.sent3: The telethon was so successful that they ran out of donation forms!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a telethon, raising spirits and bringing hope to all.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights and cheerful music made the telethon unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The act of hosting or participating in a telethon.
meanings.sent1: She felt proud after her first telethon as a volunteer.
meanings.sent2: The telethon organizer worked tirelessly to ensure its success.
meanings.sent3: Participating in the telethon was both exhausting and rewarding.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm for hosting telethons was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The community came together for the telethon, showing their support.
